name: NiNi
description:
is a game where you must not say neither "Yes" nor "No".

Each time you will write "Yes" or "No" you will pay the price of your ignominy by  make appear the corresponding word on your screen, so you never forget you failed at it !

You think this game is so easy ? Challenge yourself and try to hold at least 1 hour, maybe 1 day, unless you're some sort of hero and you will be able to complete all the achievements !

Features

  • Available in English and French
  • Seamless overlay integration inside your windows computer.
  • Works with all softwares (word,  discord, web browser, etc.)
  • Achievements
  • Earn and use different themes influenced by oldschool game consoles
  • Saves score, achievements and themes

History

I created this game as part of #JamChezMoi, a french Game Jam created to make games during the Covid-19 pandemic.

I loved teleworking so much I decide to make the experience harder by creating this game. Working with this game was so fun to me I hope it will be for you too !
